name: com.ultrakuneho.safearea
description:
This package provides the SafeAreaFitter component, a layout container that adjusts its size and position to match the screen's safe area, ensuring key UI components are visible and unobstructed by screen cutouts, notches, or rounded corners.

Features real-time previews and optimized performance using cached calculations to minimize redundant computations.
author: Stephen de Sagun <ultrakuneho+safearea@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ultrakuneho)

samples.description: Simple UI layout demonstration utilizing the SafeAreaFitter component.
